attributes.action: Ban strangers taking direct photos/videos of children without a parents consent
attributes.additional_details: Because it’s unacceptable that any adult can directly photograph or video a child in public and then do what they wish with the images without any permission from a parent or guardian
attributes.background: Make it illegal for an adult to directly photograph or video children under 18 in public places.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition we have open on the topic:

Ban the taking of photographs of children without parental consent
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560090
